content:
During the day, the russians shelled Donetsk oblast 18 times.

About thisreportedThe head of the Donetsk Regional Military Administration, Vadym Filashkin, in his Telegram channel, ArmyInform reports.

"Kramatorsk district. The night before, the Russians launched a missile attack on Sloviansk, damaging an industrial building and three trucks. Predtechine of the Kostiantynivka community, Torske and Zarichne of the Lyman community are under fire," the message reads.

In the Toretsk community, a building in Pivnichne was damaged. In the Chasiv Yar community, nine private houses were damaged. In Siversk, four houses and a non-residential building were damaged.

A person was also injured in Krasnohorivka, Marinka community. In the Kurakhove community, the outskirts of Hostre and Kurakhove were shelled.

Formerly ArmyInformreportedthat the occupiers shelled 20 settlements in the Kharkiv region: there are wounded.
title: Slavyansk attacked a rocket again
description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin in his telegram channel, reports ...
author: Army Inform
